name: Cartoon world
description:
Cartoon town is an open world game. You start in a verry small town from their you than can go to different areas. In every area their a different things, animals, enimies. The game is in development right now so i will add much more later on. You play the character from the video but later you will be able to switch between more and every character will have different abilities. 

The game is in alpha right now but if you buy the game now you will get every updates for free and the full game. The next big update is already ready to launch in 1-2 weeks.

Right now in development:

-Areas(Snow, desert and cities more later on).
-Enemies.
-Animals.
-Playable characters.
-Graphics.
-Sounds.

Planned.

-Maybe multiplayer if the game get enough votes.
-Ingame shop.
-Upgrade shop for the characters.
